tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LocalDishes (
  dish_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  dish_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  main_ingredients TEXT,
  cooking_method TEXT,
  historical_significance TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE local_dishes (
    dish_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dish_name STRING NOT NULL,
    dish_origin STRING,
    dish_ingredients STRING[],
    dish_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cooking_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    method_name STRING NOT NULL,
    method_description TEXT,
    method_tools STRING[],
    method_duration INT
);

CREATE TABLE local_dishes (
 dish_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 dish_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 ingredients TEXT,
 cooking_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cooking_methods (
 method_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 method_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE dish_reviews (
 review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 dish_id UUID REFERENCES local_dishes(dish_id),
 user_id UUID,
 rating DECIMAL(3, 1) CHECK (rating >= 0 AND rating <= 5),
 review_text TEXT,
 review_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE dish_history (
 history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 dish_id UUID REFERENCES local_dishes(dish_id),
 historical_details TEXT,
 historical_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE LocalDishes (
 dish_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 dish_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 region VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 origin_year INT,
 traditional_cooking_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Ingredients (
 ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 ingredient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 category VARCHAR(50),
 origin VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Recipes (
 recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 dish_id INT,
 recipe_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 instructions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Chefs (
 chef_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 chef_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 region_specialty VARCHAR(50),
 experience_years INT
)

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
 rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 dish_id INT,
 rating FLOAT,
 reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
